hadiths.text: Sufyan b. 'Uyainah said:I saw Sharik who led us in the 'Asr prayer during a funeral ceremony. He placed his cap in front of him, that is, for saying the obligatory prayer the time of which had come

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخَطِّ إِذَا لَمْ يَجِدْ عَصًا
chapter.eng-name: Drawing A Line If One Does Not Find A Stick
